author: kencall
body:
Updates DQMOffline/Hcal/HcalRecHitsAnalyzer, Validation/HcalRecHits/HcalRecHitsValidation, and Validation/HcalDigis/HcalDigisValidation. To accommodate the changes made in preparation for phase1.

These validation modules can handle both the old and topologies, and the addition of QIE10/11 digis.

[https://indico.cern.ch/event/567472/contributions/2293423/attachments/1331073/2000416/20160901_-_Validation_Update_1.pdf](url)
title: Update Hcal Validation Histograms
